Text:
What did you ment, with your comment.
Simple Words. Steel? Steeled Glass?  Or What? 

Dear Ghoul, not Ak-Ba, you're definitely NOT. 

AK-BA - is FOUNDER of the MOGULS. 
He beholded Peace, for a loooong Time. 

Murdered from behind, ever heared of it? 

Simple Words, is Pleased needed, 
for those like ya. 

What tha fuck did you ment. 
HOW TO BREAK STEELED GLASS?

STEEL OR STEELED GLASS; 

D'YOU WANNA KILL A TELON. GO AHEAD. 
MY GLASS-SKULL  AWAITS YA, 
SPECIALLY MY JAW. 

CAREFULLY; HEL COULD RAISE RAPIDLY. 

CAIN AWAITS YOU
LOL at crazy guy above me!
